intro: Platea hongiaoensis, commonly known as the Hongiao platea, is a flowering plant belonging to the Rubiaceae family. It is native to tropical regions of Southeast Asia, particularly found in countries like Thailand and Vietnam. The plant is characterized by its small, clustered flowers that are typically white or pale yellow in color. It thrives in moist, shaded environments and is often found in forest understories. Due to its limited distribution and habitat specificity, it is considered a rare and potentially endangered species.
